main event: A report recorded a sighting of a round fireball possibly characterized as a meteorite or rocket near Langley AFB, VA.
interesting points: The sighting was characterized as not overly significant., The object was described as a round fireball trailing thin black smoke., It appeared at approximately 4,000 feet and descended straight down into a solid cloud deck., The object disappeared into undercast at 23,000 feet., The report was submitted by Air Force personnel including Capt. Harry W. Delancey and Major Alfred C. Seers.
witness description: Capt. Harry W. Delancey, age 34; Major Alfred C. Seers, age 41
